tests/generated/login-page.spec.ts.errorMessage: Error: locator.click: Element is outside of the viewport Call log: [2m - waiting for getByRole('button').first()[22m [2m - locator resolved to …[22m [2m - attempting click action[22m [2m - scrolling into view if needed[22m [2m - done scrolling[22m

suggestedFixes.description: El elemento no estaba visible. Añadir scrollIntoViewIfNeeded() antes de la acción.
